testsuite.name: com.itau.insurance.unit.application.ProductServiceTest

testcase.name: should create AUTO product successfully, when client not send price tariff()
should update product successfully, when there is a product with id()
should update product with calculated price tariff when price tariff is not provided()
should throw DataBaseGenericException when repository findById fails()
should throw exception when repository save fails during creation()
should throw DataBaseGenericException when repository save fails during update()
should create product successfully, when client send price tariff()
should throw DataBaseGenericException when repository save fails during creation()
should create VIDA product successfully, when client not send price tariff()
should throw ProductNotFoundException, when there is not a product with id()
